body: This is A FUCKING MASTERPIECE!! The plot was bloody well done. The sex scenes were just right. The most wholesome bromance with the marriage ending and children. I am absolutely stunned. I was grinning and in tears marveling at the end of the story. Words I'd say much more cannot formulate due to how astonished I am. This was simply the MOST AMAZING THING I've ever read in years. I will pay the artist that created this legendary artwork. Well done sir! Bloody well done! My hat goes off to you!
Ayo someone needs to tell Garnt about this
the most wholesome gayest yet technically non gay story
What's the difference between this and 392026?
What a masterpiece
This is beautiful, This little one cried a little.
A very wholesome story
Even adam fuck his own backbone we gae already
No thanks dude
this is atrocious
Is this gae? Am i gae?
It's wholesome and weird at the same time

for some reason the admin skipped the chapter 2 update of the Hasumi route (and other release too....) yet my last release is up in the last update here https://nhentai.net/g/396274/ , so if anyone wants to read it head over my server where I post the links where I originally upload my stuff https://discord.gg/Pgxebwgbb2
This one is seriously so wholesome, and makes me so jealous of Kyou that I can't jerk it.
This is undoubtedly the best wholesome dojinshi/hentai i have ever read... I want more
Seeing shota/trap getting the shit beat out of him immediately made this a favourite.
A pretty wholesome story.
Anime adaptation when?
Might've been the longest I've read but it was fucking worth it
Niceeeeeee...
This was surprisingly wholesome
blessed gender bender, bless you unclebane. you're doing amazing work

Im translating the Hasumi route too btw, the update of it should be up in this site like in half a day later, if you dont like waiting for them to update the site and go to where I upload the original translation, head over my server then
https://discord.gg/Pgxebwgbb2

Chapter 1 is already uploaded here though or if you want to check my other releases look up my name here https://nhentai.net/search/?q=uncle+bane

Sum1 rly likes genderbender huh, to draw almost 600 pages lol. Well, those closed-minded morons down there aside, i myself am rather open-minded, i wouldn't mind an ability to freely switch between genders and by doing so double my fun. ^^)
Remember even if your girlfriend turns into a boy, doesn't make it any less GAY if you want to bang him.
Remember even if your BFF turns into a gurl, doesn't make it any less GAY if you wanna bang him.
